text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 76 of 236 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross 980

(Jury not present) THE COURT: Mr. Alessi, you may step down for the break. Everyone may be seated. While we're waiting, I'll just note that Ms. Williams has asked someone from A/V to come talk to the government during the break, so hopefully we can figure that out. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. THE COURT: Matters to take up? MS. COMEY: Not from the government, your Honor. MR. PAGLIUCA: No, your Honor. THE COURT: We'll meet again in ten. You'll let me know if there are any issues. Thank you. (Recess)

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and readable format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
